description: Retrieves attributes attached to the facet.

parameters.name: SchemaArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the schema where the facet resides.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the facet whose attributes will be retrieved.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: The attributes attached to the facet.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the facet attribute.

nested_items.name: AttributeDefinition
nested_items.description: A facet attribute consists of either a definition or a reference. This structure contains the attribute definition. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the attribute.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of the attribute (if configured).

nested_items.name: StringValue
nested_items.description: A string data value.

nested_items.name: BinaryValue
nested_items.description: A binary data value.

nested_items.name: BooleanValue
nested_items.description: A Boolean data value.

nested_items.name: NumberValue
nested_items.description: A number data value.

nested_items.name: DatetimeValue
nested_items.description: A date and time value.

nested_items.name: IsImmutable
nested_items.description: Whether the attribute is mutable or not.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of attribute validation rule.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The minimum and maximum parameters that are associated with the rule.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AttributeReference
nested_items.description: An attribute reference that is associated with the attribute. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_items.name: TargetFacetName
nested_items.description: The target facet name that is associated with the facet reference. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_items.name: TargetAttributeName
nested_items.description: The target attribute name that is associated with the facet reference. See Attribute References for more information.

nested_items.name: RequiredBehavior
nested_items.description: The required behavior of the FacetAttribute.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token.
